description:
Sannou Yoriko is the female lead character of this story. She has no siblings but a http://anidb.net/ch40681 [cousin] who cares a lot for her. http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] is her best friend; they have known each other since childhood, and she is possibly in love with him. She is two years Kyouta`s senior and already in college (while Kyouta is still struggling with his high school exam). She is a constant cheerleader to http://anidb.net/ch40597 [T.L. Signal] and maintains friendships with all three band members who nickname her "Yokko".
Yoriko is torn between two conflicts within herself. She struggles with the awakening powers in her, and her emerging feelings for Kyouta. It is rumored in her family that she has inherited the powers of the demigod http://anidb.net/ch40649 [Benzaiten]. The http://anidb.net/ch40598 [Arayashiki] are hungry for Yoriko to join their ranks and help them defeat their enemies, but http://anidb.net/ch40610 [other] http://anidb.net/ch5903 [forces] are also seeking Yoriko`s powers for ill. The race for her soul has begun.
name: Sannou Yoriko
